author: Takashi Mochizuki
title: Sony Posts Record Operating Profit
text:
TOKYO—Sony Corp. reported the highest fiscal-year operating profit in its 72-year history, signaling the company is firmly back on a growth track after years of losses.
The electronics and entertainment group reported operating profit of ¥735 billion ($6.7 billion) and net profit of ¥491 billion on ¥8.5 trillion in revenue.
